In order for our friend to earn her own income and help her husband with the household expenses she raises chickens and pigs. She has a shed where she raises the animals. She also sells Avon products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfume and women's accesories). She works ecery day of the week in both activities. Her daughter helps her with the sales. She sells the products on credit and collects every week. She has been a merchant for 12 years and says that thank God, it is going well for her.

This loan is to buy perfume, creams, cosmetics, and food for her animals. She has been in the communal bank since the beginning. She is the president and she likes it because the group is organized and responsible.
 
Her dream is to have a boutique.

loans.use: to buy feed for animals, perfumes, creams and cosmetics.

loans.name: Fagni Arcelis

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Las Acacias que se reúne cada quince días en el cantón Junín, este lugar se lo conoce por su gente amable y trabajadora y porque en este lugar se destila el mejor aguardiente de la provincia y  del Ecuador.

En este lugar vive la señora Fagni, tiene 42 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos de  12 y 8 años de edad, los mismos que estudian en colegio y escuela. El marido es chofer. 

Ella aprendió belleza y arreglo personal en un Centro Artesanal en esta ciudad, y aprovechando sus conocimientos adquiridos en este centro artesanal instaló en su casa un salón de belleza en el cual realiza diversidad de trabajos como tinturados, cortes de cabellos, pintado de uñas entre  otras cosas. Trabaja todos los días desde las 8h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde si sus clientes requieren de sus servicios, también vende productos de belleza, esmaltes y otros productos que sus clientes necesitan.

Este crédito lo va a emplear para comprar tintes, permanentes y productos de Avon y Yanbal. Lleva dos ciclos en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda y beneficios que recibe del banco.
 
Su sueño es tener un SPA.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Las Acacias" meets every 15 days in Junin canton.  This is a place that is known for its friendly and hardworking people, and for being the place that they distill the best brandy in the province and in Ecuador.

This is where Fagni lives.  She is 42 years old and is in a common-law marriage from which she has 2 children aged 12 and 8.  Both of her children attend school, and her husband is a driver.

She learned beauty and personal care in a craft center in this city.  Taking advantage of the knowledge she acquired from this center, she set up a beauty salon in her house where she provides all kinds of services including: hair coloring, haircuts, nail painting, and other services.  She works every day from 8am until 10pm, and at times much later if her customers need her services.  She also sells beauty products, nail polishes and other products that her customers need.

She will use this loan to buy hair coloring agents, hair permanent agents, and beauty products in the Avon and Yanbal brands.  She has been with her communal bank for 2 loan cycles, and she likes it because of the help and benefits she receives from the bank.

Her dream is to have a spa.

loans.use: to buy hair coloring agents, hair permanent agents, and beauty products in the Avon and Yanbal brands

loans.name: Genaro

texts.es: Genaro soltero con tres hijos mayores de edad, tiene por actividad economica la pesca artesanal a la cual se dedica desde hace 32 años, ya que vive en una zona costera aprovecha los recursos de trabajo, se inico con un poco de capital propio para comprar los medios de trabajo en la actualidad esta el financiamiento lo esta solicitando para marterial de trabajo como: trasmallo, redes, pangas, motor marino
texts.en: Genaro is single and has 3 grown children.  He is a fisherman who fishes using traditional techniques, and he has been doing this work for 32 years.  Because he lives in a coastal area, he takes advantages of the work resources.  He started out with a small amount of his own capital, buying his means of work.  Now he is requesting a loan to buy more equipment for his work such as: trammel nets, panga (wooden) boats, and a marine motor.

loans.use: to buy equipment for his work, including: trammel nets, other netting, panga boats and a marine motor

loans.name: Miguel Clemente

texts.es:
Miguel es un hombre de 31 años, soltero, vive con su padres y hermanos en la ciudad de Nazca; él es muy trabajador y entusiasta, desde muy joven se ha dedicado a realizar diversos trabajos en el campo, ya que siempre ha apoyado a sus padres a sacar adelante a su familia; en sus ratos libres le gusta mucho escuchar música para relajarse y en algunas ocasiones prepara un riquísimo “Arroz con Pollo” para compartir con su familia.
Gracias a su espíritu emprendedor y a sus ganas de salir adelante, Miguel se dedica a la agricultura, él cuenta con un pequeño terreno en el cual cultiva algodón, él dedica un aproximado de 6 horas diarias a su negocio y el resto del día trabaja como obrero en un fundo agropecuario de la ciudad; él se encuentra muy a gusto con los trabajos que realiza ya que siempre le ha interesado mucho el campo.
Miguel se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá cubrir los gastos de riego y la compra de fertilizantes que requiere su cultivo de algodón; de esta manera asegurará la cosecha y venta de su cultivo, y así podrá incrementar sus ingresos y poco a poco espera poder ahorrar el dinero necesario para iniciar la construcción de su casa propia.
texts.en:
Miguel is a 31 year old man. He is 31 years old, single and lives with his parents and brothers in the city of Nazca. He is very hardworking and enthusiastic. Since he was very young he has done different jobs in the fields. He has always helped his parents get the family ahead. In his free time he erally likes to listen to music to relax and sometimes he prepares a delicious “Arroz con Pollo” to share with his family.

Thanks to his enterprising spirit and his will to get ahead, Miguel works in agriculture. He has a small plot of land where he grows cotton. He spends approximately 6 hours a day at his business and the rest of the day he works as a laborer in a fish farmin in the city. He is very happy with his jobs he does since he has always been interested in farming.

Miguel is very grateful to the Kiva lenders. Thanks to their help he will be able to cover the irrigation and fertilizer expenses that his cotton crop needs. This will ensure the harvest and sale of his crop. This way he can increase his income and little by little he hopes to save the money he needs to start building his own house.

loans.use: to cover expenses for irrigation and buying fertilizer.

loans.name: Elsa Del Carmen

texts.es: Elsa del Carmen de cincuenta y cinco años de edad vive junto a su familia; ella posee una venta de comida en el mercado municipal de la zona, tiene treinta y cinco años de experiencia en el negocio y eso le ha ayudado a adquirir las mejores ventas del lugar, es muy conocida y ya tiene mucha clientela pues saben que los platillos que prepara son los más exquisitos y tiene en variedad sopas, carnes, ensaladas, desayunos, entre otros, además las personas saben que todo es elaborado con material de primera calidad y a precios accesibles; Elsa es una mujer muy amable, servicial, trabajadora y sobre todo entregada a su hogar, piensa que su vivienda es el mejor lugar para estar con su familia y donde sabe que los puede proteger, en su casa todavía no cuenta con energía eléctrica y necesita de capital para invertir en la mejora de su vivienda por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita realizar la instalación eléctrica, y comprar además algunos insumos para el negocio. Elsa del Carmen es responsable y con buenas referencias crediticias, está segura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Elsa del Carmen is 55 years old and lives with her family. She owns a food stand in the municipal market. She has 35 years of experience in this business. This experience has helped her to have the best sales of the market. She is well known and has many clients, who know that she makes the most delicious dishes and has a very complete menu of soups, meats, salads, and breakfasts, among other. Furthermore, her customers know she uses high quality ingredients to prepare the menu yet has reasonable prices. 

Elsa is a very friendly, helpful, hard working woman and above all dedicated to her home. She thinks that best place is home, where she feels is the only place that she can protect her family. Her home still does not have electric power. For this reason, she is requesting a loan to invest in home improvements. This loan will allow her to do the electrical installation and buy some ingredients for her business. Elsa del Carmen is responsible and with good credit references, she is sure that will be able pay back the debt and at the same time offer her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to do the electrical installation for her home and buy some ingredients for her business

loans.name: Mariana

texts.es:
En la parroquia crucita del cantón Portoviejo, se reúnen las socias del Banco Comunal Crucita, esta localidad se la conoce por sus hermosas playas que rodean este lindo lugar y que son muy visitadas por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, se la conoce con el nombre de  “Crucita la Bella”.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Mariana, ella tiene 67 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos los mismos que son mayores de edad e independientes. Su esposo es chofer profesional.

Nuestra amiga tiene una tienda en su casa, allí vende diversidad de productos como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, productos de bazar, licores,  gaseosas y ciertos medicamentos.  Trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 22h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, su esposo le ayuda en su trabajo cuando está desocupado. Nos cuenta que lleva más de 32 años con su tienda y que esta le ha dado muchas satisfacciones económicas y personales.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite,  licores, y otros productos.  Está en el Banco Comunal desde el principio y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan los créditos.

Su sueño es tener buena salud.
texts.en:
The members of the communal bank "Crucita" meet in Crucita parish in the canton of Portoviejo.  This town is known for the gorgeous beaches that surround this beautiful place, that are visited by many national and international tourists.  It is known by the name "Crucita la Bella" (Crucita the beautiful).

Here we meet Mariana, who is 67 years old, married and has 2 grown children who are independent.  Her husband is a professional driver.

Our friend Mariana has a store in her house where she sells a variety of products such as: rice, sugar, cooking oil, detergents, other household items, liquors, soft drinks and certain medicines.  She works every day from 6am until 10pm, and at times until even later.  Her husband helps her with her work when he's not busy.  She tells us that she has had this store for more than 32 years, and it has given her a lot of financial and personal satisfaction.

She will use this loan to stock up her store, by purchasing rice, sugar, cooking oil, liquors, and other products.  She has been with her communal bank from the start, and she likes it because of the help they give her with the loans.

Her dream is to have good health.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, cooking oil, liquor, etc.

loans.name: Cecile Viviane

texts.fr:
Cécile est une jeune commerçante âgée de 29 ans, célibataire et mère d'un enfant âgé de 05 ans qui va déjà à l'école. elle dispose d'une caisse dans laquelle elle vend les produits de première nécessité depuis pratiquement 07 ans. ceci dit, elle bénéficie d'une bonne expérience dans le domaine, ce qui lui a permit d'avoir une bonne clientèle et de fidéliser certains malgré la petitesse de son activité. Elle voudrait ainsi avec ce crédit acheter les marchandises, notamment le savon et les cigarettes en carton afin de répondre aux sollicitations de sa clientèle.
les revenus générés lui permettront d'assurer au mieux la scolarité de son enfant et à la longue d'agrandir son activité.
texts.en:
Cécile, age 29, is single and the mother of a five-year-old child who already attends school.  She is a young retailer and works in a stall where she has been selling basic supplies for almost seven years.

Thanks to her experience in this field, she has been able to build a good customer base; some of her customers regularly buy her products in spite of the small size of her business.

With this loan, she would like to purchase more goods, especially soap and cartons of cigarettes, in order to better meet her customers' demand.

Earnings from this loan will allow her to take proper care of her child's education and, in the long term, to expand her business.

loans.use: to strengthen her stock of goods (soap, cigarettes...)

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
Luz es una mujer de 51 años, vive con sus 3 hijos en la ciudad de Chincha, por diversas circunstancias desde hace muchos años se separó de sus esposo, desde entonces se ha dedicado por completo a sacar adelante a su familia; en sus ratos libres le gusta visitar a sus hijas mayores que ya son independientes y en algunas ocasiones aprovecha estas visitas para cocinar un riquísimo “Arroz Chaufa” para compartir gratos momentos con su familia.
Con mucho empeño y entusiasmo, desde hace mas de 4 años Luz trabaja en el área de cocina de una empresa agrícola de la ciudad, ella trabaja un aproximado de 10 horas diariamente, Luz se encuentra muy a gusto en su trabajo, ya que la consideran mucho por su eficiencia, rica sazón y trato amable hacia los demás.
Luz se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que requiere terminar de construir cuartos, realizar las instalaciones eléctricas, pintado de la casa y otros acabados menores; de esta manera podrá culminar con la construcción de su vivienda teniendo más comodidad y seguridad en ella, brindando de esta manera una mejor calidad de vida para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Luz is a 51 year old woman who lives with her three children in the city of Chincha. Many years ago she separated from her husband for a lot of reasons and since then has worked to help her family get ahead. In her free time she likes to visit her older daughters who are living independently. She sometimes takes the opportunity on these visits to cook a delicious fried rice to share with her family. Luz has worked in the kitchen of an agriculture industry for more than four years with a lot of hard work and enthusiasm. She works approximately 10 hours a day. Luz enjoys her job very much, and she is favored for her efficiency, her seasonings, and her kind treatment of others.

Luz is very thankful for the Kiva lenders, since they have helped her improve her home. It now needs the completion of the construction of some rooms, electricity, paint, and some other final touches. In this way she will finish remodeling her home to have greater comfort and security in it, to provide a better quality of life for her children.

loans.use: improve her home

loans.name: Zoila Emperatriz

texts.es:
En la parroquia crucita del cantón Portoviejo, se reúnen las socias del Banco Comunal Crucita, esta localidad se la conoce por sus hermosas playas que rodean este lindo lugar y que son muy visitadas por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, se la conoce con el nombre de  “Crucita la Bella”.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Zoila, tiene 45 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos, uno de ellos ya es mayor de edad, la menor tiene 11 años y   estudian en colegio y es la que  aun vive con ella. Su esposo se dedica a la pesca pero en temporadas.

Nuestra amiga es un ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de productos de Avon (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Trabaja tres días a la semana de dos a tres horas al día, deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada ocho días. Tiene más de cinco  años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien, nos cuenta que lo que más vende son los perfumes y cosméticos ya que según dice son muy buenos.

Este crédito es para comprar perfumes, cremas, cosméticos entre otras cosas. Lleva más de 10 años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los pagos son fáciles de hacer.
 
Su sueño es darle lo mejor a su hija.
texts.en:
In the Crucita area of Portoviejo the members of the Crucita Community Bank get together. This area is known for the beautiful beaches surrounding this lovely place. The beaches are very visited by local and foreign tourists and is known as "Crucita the Beautiful".

Here we met Mrs. Zoila. She is 45 years old, married, and has two children from this union. One of them is older and her younger daughter is 11 years old and studies in secondary school and still lives with her. Her husband works fishing but only in some seasons.

Our friend is a housewife who works selling Avon products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfume, and ladies' accessories) in order to earn her own money and help her husband with the expenses of the home. She works three days a week for two to three hours a day. She sells her products on credit and collects weekly. She has been doing this work for more than 5 years and it is going very well for her. She shared with us that she sells the most of the perfume and cosmetics, and she says they are very good.

This loan is for buying perfume, lotion, cosmetics, and other items. She has been with the Community Bank for more than 10 years and she likes it because the payments are easy to make. Her dream is to give her daughter all the best.

loans.use: buy perfume, lotions, cosmetics, etc.

loans.name: Vicenta De Las Mercedes

texts.es:
En la parroquia crucita del cantón Portoviejo, se reúnen las socias del Banco Comunal Crucita, esta localidad se la conoce por sus hermosas playas que rodean este lindo lugar y que son muy visitadas por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, se la conoce con el nombre de  “Crucita la Bella”.

En este lugar vive la señora Mercedes, tiene 39 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos de 16 y 11 años de edad los mismos que estudian en colegio. El marido es panadero. 

Nuestra amiga junto a su familia tiene una panadería en su casa desde hace mas de 10 años, allí dia a dia ellos elaboran el delicioso pan en varios moldes y sabores, nos cuenta que desde la madrugada ellos hornear el pan ya que a las cinco de la mañana lleguen sus clientes y lleven el pan alimento indispensable en la mesa de los ecuatorianos.

Este crédito es para comprar harina, azúcar y otros ingredientes para elaborar el pan. Lleva más de más de 5 años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la unión del grupo.
 
Sus sueños son seguir adelante en su negocio y su vida familiar.
texts.en:
In the parish of Portoviejo, the members of the Communal Bank Crucita meet. This location is known for its beautiful beaches that surround this beautiful place and is heavily visited by national and international tourists, it is known as "Crucita la Bella," or Crucita the Beautiful.

Mercedes lives here, she is 39 years old and is in a long term relationship from which she has two children, 16 and 11 years old, who both go to secondary school. Her husband is a baker.

Our friend, along with her family, has had a bakery in her home for more than 10 years and every day they make their delicious bread in various shapes and flavors. She tells us that they are up with the dawn to bake the bread and that their clients arrive starting at five in the morning in order to get bread, an indispensable food on Ecuadorian tables. 

This loan is to purchase flour, sugar and other ingredients used to make bread. She has been with the community bank for more than 5 years and she likes being in the group.

Her dream is to continue to grow her business and improve her family's life.

loans.use: purchase flour, sugar and other ingredients to make bread.

loans.name: Yolanda Marilu

texts.es:
En la parroquia crucita del cantón Portoviejo, se reúnen las socias del Banco Comunal Crucita, esta localidad se la conoce por sus hermosas playas que rodean este lindo lugar y que son muy visitadas por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, se la conoce con el nombre de  “Crucita la Bella”.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Yolanda, tiene 30 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de 9 y 6 años de edad, los mismos que estudian en escuela. Su esposo tiene un taller de mecánica automotriz.

Nuestra amiga es una muy buena ama de casa y esposa que realiza el crédito para que su esposo lo utilice en su negocio, él tiene un taller de mecánica automotriz, pero también en su local vende aceites, y ciertos repuestos para los automóviles, él trabaja todos los días y lleva más de cinco años con este trabajo en el cual nos dice nuestra amiga casi nunca le ha faltado trabajo, con él trabaja un ayudante a quien se le paga por su trabajo.

Este crédito es para comprar aceites, líquidos de frenos y varios repuestos. Lleva más de más de 2 años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la facilidad para conseguir los créditos.
 
Su sueño es darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
In the Crucita area of Portoviejo the members of the Crucita Community Bank get together. This area is known for the beautiful beaches surrounding this lovely place. The beaches are very visited by local and foreign tourists and is known as "Crucita the Beautiful".

Here we met Mrs. Yolanda. She is 30 years old, married, and has two children who are 9 and 6 years old and study in school. Her husband has an auto mechanic shop.

Our friend is a very good housewife who has requested the loan for her husband to use in his business. He has an auto mechanic shop, but also sells oil and certain car parts from his shop. He works every day and has been doing this work for more than 5 years, and in this time she says he has almost never missed a day of work. He has an employee who is paid to work with him.

This loan is for buying oil, brake fluid, and various car parts. She has been in the Community Bank for more than 2 years and she likes the ease of obtaining loans. Her dream is to give her children the best.

loans.use: buy oil, brake fluid, and parts

loans.name: María Candelaria

texts.es:
En la parroquia crucita del cantón Portoviejo, se reúnen las socias del Banco Comunal Crucita, esta localidad se la conoce por sus hermosas playas que rodean este lindo lugar y que son muy visitadas por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, se la conoce con el nombre de  “Crucita la Bella”.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora María, tiene 52 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cuatro hijos pero uno de ellos falleció, los tres hijos que aun tiene ya son mayores de edad  y aun vive con ella. Su esposo es chofer.
 
Nuestra amiga es una muy buena ama de casa y esposa que realiza el crédito para que su esposo lo utilice en su negocio, él tiene un negocio de venta de arena y materiales de construcción, nos cuenta que dia a dia el lleva a Portoviejo y otros lugares arena a distintos lugares donde venden este material muy importante para el campo de la construcción. El lleva más de 20 años realizando esta labor la cual con la bendición de Dios les ha dado para sacar adelante a su familia.

Este crédito es para comprar materiales de construcción. Lleva más de más de 10 años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que le han dado hasta el dia de hoy.
 
Su sueño es comprar una volqueta ya que el carro en el que trabaja su marido es de su suegra.
texts.en:
The members of the Crucita Communal bank meet in the Crucita parish, Portoviejo province.  The area is known for its beautiful beaches that surround this lovely place and  which are visited by national and foreign tourists who know it as “Crucita la Bella” (Crucita the Beautiful).

Here we meet Maria, 52, married and with four children.  One of them died; the other three are adults and still live with her.  Her husband is a driver.

Our friend is a good housewife and wife who has received the loan so that her husband can use it in his business.  He sells sand and construction materials.  She says that every day he transports sand to Portoviejo and other places where this very important material for construction is sold.  He has been doing this for more than 20 years by which, thank God, he has been able to get his family ahead.

She will use the loan to buy construction materials.  Maria has been with the communal bank for more than 10 years and she likes it because of the help it has given her.

Her dream is to buy a truck since the one that her husband uses for his work belongs to her mother-in-law.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: María Yomaira

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Trabajando Para Un Futuro. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños que son reconocidos en todo el país y por la calidez de su gente amable y trabajadora.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora María, tiene 29 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de  6, 5 y de 11 meses de edad,  los dos mayores estudian en escuela. Su esposo se dedica a la agricultura.

Nuestra amiga realiza el crédito para ayudar a su esposo en su trabajo, él se dedica a la agricultura y tiene cultivos de arroz, nos cuenta que su producción está muy buena y que en la actualidad ya están recogiendo la cosecha, para eso es precisamente que necesitan del crédito para el pago de mano de obra ya que si ellos venden la cosecha en estos momentos tendrían que vender muy barato y con esto los que se llevarían la ganancia serian los comerciantes mayoristas, es por eso que al obtener el crédito ellos pueden esperar un poco y así obtener mejores ganancias por el duro trabajo en el campo. Ellos siembran en toda época del año pues cuentan con los equipos de bombeo de agua. 

Este crédito es para pago de mano de obra. Esta desde el inicio en el Banco Comunal y pertenece a la directiva del mismo, le gusta porque es un grupo muy bueno y ordenado.
 
Su sueño es darles una buena educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The members of Trabajando para un Futuro Communal Bank meet every two weeks In Rocafuerte Canton.  This place is known for the delicious sweets made by locals that are known throughout the country and for the warmth of its kind and hardworking people.

Here we met María, 29.  She is married and has three children from this relationship, ages 6, 5, and 11 months.  The two older ones are in school.  Her husband works in agriculture.

Our friend is getting the loan to help her husband in his job.  He works in agriculture and has rice crops.  She tells us that his production is very good and that currently they are already gathering the harvest.  This is exactly why they need the loan, to pay for labor, because if they sold the crop right now they would have to sell it very cheap, and the wholesale merchants would be the ones to get the profits.  This is why, upon getting the loan, they can wait a little and get better profits from the hard field work.  They plant every season of the year because they have water-pumping equipment.

This loan is to pay for labor.  She has been in the communal bank since the beginning and she is on the bank board.  She likes it because it's a very good and organized group.

Her dream is to give her children a good education.

loans.use: to pay for labor.

loans.name: Citlali Group

texts.es: Las integrantes del grupo siguen en sus negocios que vienen desarrollando, ella quieren decirle a Kiva y a Visión Fund “gracias por sus préstamos, por apoyarnos a crecer los negocio y vivir mejor con la familia. La señora Altagracia tiene 72 años de edad, ella es viuda, ella tiene 7 hijos, 2 mujeres y 5 varones todos mayores de edad ya casados, ella vende flores claveles, nubes, ella solicito su préstamo para comprar abono y fertilizante para su siembra de flores para que se den mas bonitas, ella inicio su negocio hace 30 años, por necesidad, ella consiguió la semilla para sembrar. Su negocio es importante porque tiene ingresos para la comida, a ella le gusta trabajar ver las flores en el campo que se ven muy bonitas, ella vende las flores con otras señoras que venden flores en los pueblos, ella utiliza las ganancias para comprar alimento para sus pollo y puercos que ya que están gordos los vende. Sus sueños y esperanzas son seguir creciendo en su negocio y que sus hijos sigan trabajando y que no les falte lo necesario para la familia y sigan adelante contentos.
texts.en:
The members of the group are still developing their businesses; she wants to say to Kiva and Vision Fund "thank you for your loans, for supporting us to grow the business, which give us a better standard of living for our families. 

Altagracia is 72 years old, a widow, and has seven children; two women and five men all older and already married. She sells flowers carnations and “nubes”. 

She asked for a loan to buy fertilizer so her flowers grow more beautiful. She started her business 30 years ago, out of necessity; she got the seed for sowing. Her business is important because it provides her the income to buy her family’s food; she likes work and sees the flowers in the field, which are very pretty. 

She sells the flowers with other ladies who sell flowers in the villages. She uses the profits to buy food for her chickens and pigs that are sold after fattened. Her dreams and hopes are to continue growing her business and that her children will continue to work and that their families will not lack any basic needs and will continue to be happy.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer so her flowers grow more beautiful

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia is married with 5 children. She is 55-years-old and lives in the Philippines.

Alicia is a farmer and manages rice production to earn a living. She has been doing this for 20 years and every month she earns PHP 13,000 from this work. She has requested a loan of PHP 15,000 to purchase fertilizers and seedlings for the next cropping season.

Alicia has been a member of GDMPC for 2 years. In the future, Alicia hopes to have her children finish their studies.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and seedlings for the next cropping season

loans.name: María Gabriela

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Trabajando Para Un Futuro. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños que son reconocidos en todo el país y por la calidez de su gente amable y trabajadora.

En este lugar vive la señora María, tiene 27 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo de cinco años de edad el cual estudia en escuela. Su marido se dedica a la agricultura.

Nuestra amiga trabaja de maestra en una escuela privada en la localidad, pero también se dedica al comercio, ella en sociedad con su suegro tienen  una tienda en la casa del suegro, allí  venden toda clase de víveres y además algunos remedios y tarjetas telefónicas ya que esto les da ganancias extras, trabajan todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 21h00, allí en las mañanas trabaja su suegro y ella una vez que llega de la escuela se hace cargo del negocio. Lleva más de 3  años con esta sociedad en la cual están muy bien ya que el negocio si les deja buenos ingresos. Además su esposo siembra cebolla perla en la cual también utiliza parte del crédito.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar víveres e insumos agrícolas para los sembríos de su esposo. Está en el Banco Comunal desde sus inicios  y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan con los créditos. 

Sus metas son agrandar aun más su negocio y darle lo mejor a su pequeño hijo.
texts.en:
The members of Trabajando para un Futuro Communal Bank meet every two weeks in Rocafuerte Canton. This place is known for the delicious sweets made by locals that are known throughout the country and for the warmth of its kind and hardworking people.

This is where María, 27, lives.  She has a common-law relationship from which she has a five-year-old son who is in school.  Her husband works in agriculture.

Our friend works as a teacher in a private school in the town, but she also works in business.  She and her father-in-law have a store in her father-in-law's house where they sell all types of provisions as well as some medicines and telephone cards because these give them extra profits.  They work every day from 6:00 a.m. until 9:00 p.m.  Her father-in-law is there in the mornings and once she arrives from school she takes charge of the business.  She has been in this venture for three years and they are very good with it because the business gives them good income.  Her husband also grows pearl onions, on which she also will use part of the loan.

She is going to use this loan to buy provisions and agricultural supplies for her husband's fields.  She has been in the communal bank since the beginning and she likes it for the help they get with the loans.

Her goals are to expand the business even more and give her little boy the best.

loans.use: to buy provisions and agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Darlinda

texts.en:
Darlinda comes from Lilo-an, Bonifacio. She is 56 years old. Darlinda is married and has 4 children. To earn a living, she plants and harvests rice to sell. She has been in this business for 12 years and earns 4,500 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2009, Darlinda joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Darlinda is requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP which will be used to purchase fertilizers and seedlings for the next crop. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and seedlings for the next crop.

loans.name: Anita

texts.es:
La señora Anita es originaria del municipio de El Sauce, labora como profesora donde tiene muchos años de experiencia en este oficio, actividad que le ha permitido adquirir electrodomésticos para el hogar e ir mejorando su vivienda poco a poco.
Como madre responsable de sus hijas trata de darles lo mejor de sí en cariño y bienestar en el hogar con todas sus condiciones adecuadas.
Tiene dos años de trabajar con ceprodel donde le han otorgado seis créditos para comprar electrodomésticos, para mejora de vivienda y para pagar la universidad de su hija, razón por la cual agradece a esta Institución ya que gracias a ella tiene lo que hoy es su humilde hogar con el mobiliario necesario y que sin ello no hubiera podido adquirir esto porque con su bajo salario con costo alcanza para la canasta básica que es lo principal en un hogar.
Uno de sus mayores sueños es preparar a su hija como profesional para que sea un buen médico en el futuro por lo cual está solicitando para pagar todos los gastos universitarios y no tener ningún obstáculo en el futuro para que su hija culmine su carrera.
texts.en:
Ms. Anita is from the municipality of El Sauce and works in the capacity of professor in which she has many years of experience. With this activity she has been able to acquire appliances for her home and make gradual improvements to her living quarters. 

As a responsible mother to her daughters she tries to give them her best, in terms of affection and wellbeing at home with all the appropriate facilities. 

She has been working with Ceprodel for two years where she has been given six loans for purchasing appliances in order to improve her living quarters and pay university costs for her daughter. So she is grateful to this institution since, thanks to it, she has what today is her humble home with the necessary furnishings, and without which she would not have been able to acquire it since with her low salary and costs she has just enough to cover household essentials which is the main thing. 

One of her greatest dreams is to have her daughter educated to be a professional so she may be a good doctor in the future, and so she is seeking money to cover all the costs of the University so that there may be no obstacle in the future to her daughter finishing her studies.

loans.use: to cover costs of attending University for her daughter.

loans.name: San Damian Group

texts.es:
El comité se llama San Damian  las miembros están en el segundo ciclo con 16  integrantes, es un grupo que se destaca  en el barrio por ser muy unidas solidarias  y responsables. Todas ellas se ayudan siempre para que por medio del trabajo en conjunto puedan salir adelante.
Marta es la presidenta del grupo, y comenta que siempre ella trata de ayudar a su grupo e incentivarle para que día a día se esfuercen más y más para poder sobresalir. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropas de todo tipo como ser camperas, jeans, remeras, camisas y demás. Es gracias a su esfuerzo y su lucha que ha podido salir adelante y ayudar a su familia en todo lo que puede.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de prendas de invierno, ya que se acerca el frío y quiere tener buena variedad para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The committee is called "San Damian" and its members are in their second loan cycle with 16 members. It is a group that stands out in the neighborhood for being very supportive of one another and responsible. They all help each other always so that, by working together, they may get ahead. 

Marta is the group's chair and comments that she always tries to help the group and motivate it to work harder day by day in order to overcome. She earns a living selling all types of clothing such as jackets, jeans, T-shirts and sports tops, shirts and other items. It is thanks to her effort and determination that she has been able to get ahead and help her family as much as she can. 

She is seeking the loan for the purchase of winter clothing since cold weather is coming and she wishes to have a good variety to offer her customers.

loans.use: to purchase winter clothing for sale.

loans.name: Lorenz

texts.en:
Lorenz is a married man who has two children. He is forty years old and resides in Calamba, Misamis Occidental in the Philippines. Lorenz owns and operates farmland, planting and harvesting coconuts and vegetables to sell in order to earn a living. He has been in this business for five years. Each month, he earns 8,000 PHP doing this type of business. 

Lorenz has requested a loan of 3,000 PHP to purchase manure to use as fertilizer. In 2012, he joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve his business and living situation. In the future, Lorenz wants to make improvements to his house and improve the general living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to purchase manure to use as fertilizer.

loans.name: Ellen

texts.en:
Ellen is a 33-year-old resident of New Village, Tambulig. She provides for her child's needs with the little amount of 10,000 PHP that she gains monthly from her rice production business, a business she started 3 years ago as an aid to the income gained by her husband. 

Ellen became a member of GDMPC in 2010 and has applied for a loan from GDMPC of 20,000 PHP to buy fertilizers. She wants to expand her business one day.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers.

loans.name: Mariela Del Carmen

texts.es: Mariela del Carmen  casada, con veintiocho  años de edad con actividad economica comerciante  con tres hijos de edad , ha demostrada su responsabilidad, muy trabajora, emprendedora  esta solicitando el credito para las mejoras de su vivienda y embaldosar una parte de la vivienda ya que tiene cinco alños de haberla comprado, pero por falta de capital  no habia podido realizar la mejoras necesaria para la estabilidad y proteccion de su familia , el financiamiento lo invertira en la compra de material para contruir como: zinc, alfajillas, cementos, madera, clavadores entre otros.
texts.en:
Mariela del Carmen married, 28 year-old merchant with three sons. She is a responsible, hard working, and entrepreneurial woman. 

She is requesting the loan to improve her house and put the floor of a portion of her house, it is going to be more than five years since she bought it but because of a lack of capital, she had not been able to make the necessary improvements for the stability and protection of her family. The funds will be invested in the purchase of the materials needed to improve her house as: zinc, rafters, cement, and wood, among others.

loans.use: to purchase the materials needed to improve her house as: zinc, rafters, cement, and wood, among others.

loans.name: Virgen De La Asuncion Group

texts.es:
El comité  Virgen de las Asunción  se encuentra en el 1º ciclo del programa de mujeres emprendedoras de la fundación paraguaya. Ellas están aprendiendo a trabajar juntas y de esa forma poder cumplir con sus objetivos.
La Sra. Adda se dedica a la venta de leche, sábanas y gallinas, y  nos comenta que ella siempre se esfuerza por su familia, que ellos son su razón de lucha diaria y que quiere darles todo lo que necesitan para tener una vida digna y sin privaciones. Ella se define como una persona con un gran espíritu de lucha y ganas de crecimiento.
Adda solicita el préstamo para la compra de leche y sabanas, con lo cual podrá surtirse y de esa forma seguir ofreciendo sus productos a sus clientes. Cuenta que la asistencia de fundación paraguaya le ha servido mucho.
texts.en:
The committe "Virgen de la Asunción" is in the first loan cycle of the Enterprising Women Program of Fundación Paraguaya. They are learning to work together and thus be able to achieve their objectives. 

Ms. Adda earns a living selling milk, sheets and chickens, and tells us that she always makes the effort for her family. They are her daily inspiration and she wishes to give them everything they need in order to have a dignified life without deprivations. She defines herself as a person with a strong fighting spirit and the desire to grow. 

Adda is seeking the loan to purchase milk and sheets with which to stock up and so continue offering her products to her customers. She states that the assistance of Fundación Paraguaya has helped her a great deal.

loans.use: to purchase milk and sheets.

loans.name: Las Divinas Group

texts.es:
El comité “Las Divinas” gracias a su esfuerzo y a su ayuda conjunta se encuentra en el décimo Quinto ciclo del programa de Mujeres Emprendedoras de la Fundación Paraguaya, tiene 18 integrantes, de la ciudad de Asunción, donde  todas se sacrifican cada día para dar a sus familias un futuro distinto del que a ella toco vivir, para que puedan  ser hombres y mujeres de provecho para la sociedad.
Ezequiela es la presidenta de grupo, y comenta que gracias a su trabajo y a su sacrificio ha podido ayudar a su familia y dales una vida digan. Ella es modista y comenta que empezó con un pequeño taller de costura que de a poco y con mucho esfuerzo ha ido agrandando y hoy en dia ya es una microempresaria muy exitosa.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de telas, hilos, agujas, goma, y demás insumos necesarios para poder seguir trabajando. Ezequiela y su grupo agradecen por la ayuda que reciben de fundación paraguaya y de kiva.
texts.en:
The committee "Las Divinas," thanks to its effort and collective support, is in its fifteenth loan cycles of the Enterprising Women Program of Fundación Paraguaya. It has 18 members from the city of Asunción, where they all make sacrifices every day to give their families a different future from the one that befell the members themselves, so they could be men and women who are useful to society. 

Ezequiela is the group's chair and comments that, thanks to her work and her sacrifice, she has been able to help her family and give them a worthy life. She is a dressmaker and comments that she began with a small dressmaking workshop which she has, with much effort, been gradually expanding. Today it is a very successful microenterprise. 

She is seeking the loan for the purchase of cloth, thread, needles, glue and other supplies necessary for her to continue working. Ezequiela and her group are grateful for the help they receive from Fundación Paraguaya and from Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase cloth, thread, needles, glue and other supplies.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en: Elizabeth, married, is 45 years old, and resides at Bonifacio, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Elizabeth owns and operates farm land, planting and harvesting corn to sell to earn a living. She's been 13 years in this business. Each month, she earns PHP 5,000 doing this type of business. She requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to purchase fertilizers. Just this year, Elizabeth joined GDMPC. In the future, Elizabeth wants to make improvements to her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers.

loans.name: Rudy

texts.en: Rudy is married. He is 47 years old with 3 kids. Rudy lives in Lilo-an, Bonifacio Mis. Occ. Rudy used his last loan to purchase goods for his sari-sari (general) store. His business is successful, and he is taking a new loan for his balut (fertilized egg) making business to obtain more eggs. In the future he hopes to be able to expand his business.

loans.use: to obtain more eggs.

loans.name: Sim

texts.en:
Sim is 32 years of her age and a loving mother of three school-age children. She, together with her husband, manages a rice farming and hog raising business while they are raising the family. She built a wooden pigpen in her yard for raising her pigs, yet it’s not really a comfortable place for her pigs. She plans to renovate it later when she earns a good income from selling her pigs. Sim has been in the business for almost 13 years. Normally she can generate USD 2.00 per day on average for her daily expenses.

To help in developing her business and make a sustainable income, she is looking for a loan of KHR 1,500,000 to purchase a female cow for breeding purpose. This loan enables her to have enough capital to improve her business. She hopes that she will obtain a good income through her strong commitment and high patience.

loans.use: to purchase a female cow for breeding purposes.

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen is widowed with 6 children. She is 55 years old and lives in Adorable, Jimenez.

Helen is a farmer and raises pigs to earn a living. She has been doing this for 5 years. Helen has requested a loan of 13,000 PHP to purchase additional feed for her pig business. 

Helen has been a member of PMPC for 4 years. In the future, she hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional feed for her pig business.

loans.name: Maryjane

texts.en: Maryjane, 34 years old, lives in Tuburan, Aloran, Misamis Occidental. She is married and has two children. Maryjane has operated a general store business for two years. She has requested a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase more stock for her store. Maryjane has been a member of PMPC for two years.  In the future, she hopes to have enough savings someday.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her store

loans.name: Francisca Corina

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Trabajando Para Un Futuro. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños que son reconocidos en todo el país y por la calidez de su gente amable y trabajadora.

En este lugar vive la señora Francisca, tiene 31 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo de un año de edad el cual es su razón de vivir. El marido es guardia de seguridad.
 
Nuestra amiga para poder ayudar en algo a su esposo con los gastos del hogar y al ver que su marido no gana lo suficiente solicito un crédito con el cual adecuo un pequeño local en su casa y en el mismo surtió una pequeña tienda de víveres, la misma que la tiene hace dos años pero que a pesar de tener tan poco tiempo le da buenas ganancias y satisfacciones, además en su casa ella también cría pollos ya que cuenta con el espacio suficiente, trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00 en ambas actividades, ella está muy contenta ya que así se gana algo sin descuidara a su pequeño hijo y su hogar.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar arroz, azúcar, aceites y pollos. Está en el Banco Comunal hace 5 ciclos y le gusta por la ayuda que le brindan con los créditos.

Sus metas son seguir adelante en su negocio y su vida familiar.
texts.en:
In Rocafuerte district, members from the “Working for a Future” communal bank meet every 15 days. This place is characterized for its delicious candies prepared by locals that are well known in their country and friendly, and hardworking inhabitants.

Here, Francisca lives, is 31 years old, in a common law marriage, and has a 1 year old son that is her reason for living. Her husband is a security guard.

In order to help her husband with household expenditures, since he does not make enough with his salary, she requested a loan to build a small local in her home and stock it with groceries. She has had this grocery store for only 2 years but it has yielded lots of profits. She also raises chickens in her property. She works every day from 6am to 8pm in both activities. She is very happy because she will be able to maintain her home and family.

This loan will be used to buy rice, sugar, oil, and chicken.

This is her 5th loan with the communal bank and she is thankful for the help being offered.

loans.use: buy rice, sugar, oil, and chicken

loans.name: Zoila Monserrate

texts.es:
En la parroquia crucita del cantón Portoviejo, se reúnen las socias del Banco Comunal Crucita, esta localidad se la conoce por sus hermosas playas que rodean este lindo lugar y que son muy visitadas por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, se la conoce con el nombre de  “Crucita la Bella”.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Zoila, tiene 51 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cuatro hijos, tres de ellos ya mayores de edad y el menor tiene 17 años  y es el que aun vive con ella. Su esposo es chofer.

Nuestra amiga  es una muy buena ama de casa que para ganar algo  y con esto ayudar con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de comida rápida como: hamburguesas, tostadas, batidos de frutas, gaseosas, entre otras cosas, ella arrienda un local frente a la playa y trabaja desde las 16h00 hasta las 22h00 y en temporadas de feriados hasta más tarde ya que es cuando más ventas tiene. Lleva dos años con su negocio  y le va muy bien.
 
Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar frutas, carne, pan y  otros víveres para la preparación de los alimentos. Lleva más de más de 6 años en el Banco Comunal, es la secretaria del banco y le gusta porque los créditos le son de mucha ayuda para salir adelante.
 
Su sueño es tener un local propio.
texts.en:
The members of the Crucita Communal Bank get together every two weeks in the Crucita parish of the Portoviejo settlement, an area known for the beautiful beaches that surround this beautiful place and are well visited by national and foreign tourists.  It’s known as “Crucita la Bella.”
 
Here we meet Zoila.  She is 51 years old, married, and has four children.  Three of them are fully grown and the youngest is 17 years old and still lives with her.  Her husband is a driver.
 
Our friend is a very good housewife who, in order to earn something and be able to help with the household expenses, sells fast food such as hamburgers, tostadas, fruit smoothies, and soft drinks, among other things.  She rents a stall near the beach and works from 4:00 pm to 10:00 pm and later whenever the fairs are run because this is when her sales increase.  She has been running her business for two years and things are going well.

She will use the money from this loan to buy fruit, meat, bread, and other ingredients to prepare her food.  She has been a part of the communal bank for more than six years.  She is the secretary and she enjoys it because the loans are of great help to her getting ahead.

Her dream is to have her own shop.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Alexander

texts.es:
El señor Alexander es un hombre trabajador y emprendedor quien se dedica al crianza y engorde de pollo. Este negocio lo inicio hace 2 años con la ayuda de su madre e invertirá el crédito en alimentos y animales.
Él está casado y tiene un pequeño de 5 años por el cual trabaja arduamente.
texts.en:
Mr. Alexander is a hardworking and enterprising man who devotes himself to raising and fattening chickens. He started this business two years ago with the help of his mother and will invest the loan in feed and animals. 

He is married and has a young child five years of age for whom he works hard.

loans.use: to purchase animal feed, chickens and pigs.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es:
La señora Rosario de la Cruz es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora de 67 años, casada y tiene tres hijos ya mayores. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa, cosméticos y cremas desde  15 años, negocio que ha ido creciendo y desarrollando con la ayuda de sus hermanos e hijos para la comercialización y por los préstamos en la inversión de productos. 
El préstamo lo invertirá en mercadería de ropa, cosméticos y cremas.
texts.en:
Ms. Rosario de la Cruz is a hardworking and enterprising woman, 67 years of age, married and with three grown children. She earns a living selling clothing, cosmetics and creams which she has done for 15 years. Her business has been growing and developing with the help of her siblings and children for the selling, and through the loans for investing in products. 

She will invest the loan in merchandise of clothing, cosmetics and creams.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise of clothing, cosmetics and creams.

loans.name: Paulita

texts.en:
Paulita is 58 years old and lives in Tabo-o, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with 2 children. 

Paulita has a fish vending business and earns approximately 3,500 PHP each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 7,000 PHP to  purchase more fish for her fish vending business.
 
Paulita has been a member of PMPC for 7 years. In the future, she hopes to expand her business to other areas.

loans.use: to purchase more fish for her fish vending business.

loans.name: Virgincita

texts.en:
Virgincita, 56 years of age, is a widow who lives in Mitan-ag, Bonifacio, Misamis Occidental together with her 3 children. Virgincita operates a sari-sari (variety) store to earn a living. She has been in this business for 12 years and she earns 5,000 PHP every month. Virgincita is requesting a loan of 7,000 PHP to purchase supplementary goods for her general store.

Virgincita joined GDMPC in 2007. In the future, she will use her income to support her 3 children in their daily needs and in their studies until they finish college. Virgincita hopes for her business to grow.

loans.use: to purchase supplementary goods for her store.

loans.name: Haidee

texts.en: Haidee, 31 years old, is single. She resides in San Vicente, Tambulig, Zamboanga Del Sur, Philippines. For the past 7 years, Haidee has owned and operated a farm, planting and harvesting rice for sale. She earns PHP 7,000 monthly from this business. Haidee has requested a loan of PHP 18,000 to purchase fertilizers and seedlings for the next cropping. In 2009, Haidee joined GDMPC. In the future, she wants to make improvements to her house and to the family's general living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and seedlings for the next cropping

location.town: San Vicente, Tambulig, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Saran's Group

texts.en:
Saran, aged 38, is married and has six children, three daughters and three sons. She lives with her family in a rural village located in the Ratanak Mondul district of Cambodia. Three of her children are dependent and still in school. 

She earns a living through farming rice on a one-hectare plot of farmland, planting red maize and green pepper. Saran has been in these businesses as the family’s source of income for several years and has faced a few challenges such as low crop yield, decrease of market price, and insects. With her current business, she is able to earn around 25,000 KHR per day to feed her family. 

Saran’s group consists of three members who live in the same village. This is the first loan for Saran with VisionFund. Now leading her group to apply for a loan, Saran is going to use her portion to buy seeds and fertilizer and also use a portion of it to spend for land preparation. 

She hopes to increase her crop yields and sell her crops for a good price so as to keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer for her farmland.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay bills in advance and purchase new uniforms

loans.name: Margarito

texts.es:
El Sr. Margarito labora en una empresa de la ciudad, cuenta con un año de antigüedad su esposa la Sra. Rosa labora en una maquiladora desde hace cinco años, tienen un hijo pequeño y con ellos vive la mamá de la Sra. Rosa quien es la que se encarga del cuidado de su hijo mientras ellos trabajan. 
Con la construcción de esta barda podrán estar más tranquilos por la seguridad de sus hijos mientras ellos trabajan ya que debido a la delincuencia se tienen que tomar medidas de este tipo.
texts.en:
Mr. Margarito works in a business in the city where he has been for one year. His wife Ms. Rosa works in a maquiladora (factory) which she has done for five years. They have a small child and Ms. Rosa's mom also lives with them and takes care of their child while they are working. 

With the construction of this wall they will be able to feel more comfortable about their children's safety while they are working since, owing to crime, people must take measures of this sort.

loans.use: to purchase materials and labor costs for building a side wall.

loans.name: Vimie

texts.en:
Vimie, 45 years of age, is single. She lives in Poblacion, Bonifacio, Philippines. For the past 8 years, Vimie has operated a general store, selling a variety of products to local community members. She earns PHP 30,000 from this work. Vimie has requested a loan of PHP 40,000 to purchase new items to expand product offerings.

In 2011, Vimie joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. Vimie hopes to improve her family's general living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase new items to expand product offerings

loans.name: Mary's Group

texts.en:
Mary is a villager in the Dambae district. She and her family have been farming rice and planting cassava for ten years. Mary has seven children, five of whom live with the family. Among the five, some are still in school and some are working. On average, Mary's family earns 14,000 Khmer Riel (KHR) per day.

Mary's group consists of two female members who have been with VisionFund for three loan cycles. Now that their loans have ended, they are requesting their fourth loans. As the leader, Mary will use her portion on land preparation, such as land plowing and labor fees. She hopes this loan will allow her to earn enough income to pay her children's school fees until they graduate so that they can find good jobs.

loans.use: To pay for land plowing and labor fees

loans.name: Ham

texts.en:
Ham is a resident of Baray district, Kompong Tom province. He is 44 years old and married with 4 children, 3 of whom are already married and have independent lives. At present, Ham is a worker who works on a papaya plantation that is not far from his home. He is able to earn a wage of 3.00 USD per day. On the side, he operates and manages his own farm, growing rice during the rainy season. To help him support the family, Ham's wife earns an income by raising some piglets for slaughter as well as by distilling traditional Khmer white wine for people around her community.

Ham is now asking for a loan from HKL and Kiva to buy an extra plot of farmland to increase his rice production. With the income generated from this land, he will pay back his lenders regularly until he completely owns the land and earns an income for his family's household. This will be Ham's fourth loan with HKL, and he has already successfully paid off his previous loans.

loans.use: to buy an extra plot of farmland.

loans.name: Eng

texts.en:
Living in a rural area located in the Prey Chhor district, Eng is a 58-year-old widower with eight children, four of whom are dependent and who are still in school and selling grocery items. 

He earns a living through planting cassava as a primary business and sometimes he works as a motor taxi driver. 

Eng is a second-cycle client with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, and he successfully paid back the past loan, which has helped him keep his children in school and build on some savings. Now he is able to earn around 25,000 KHR per day. 

Now requesting another loan, he will use it to buy a motorbike for his business. He hopes this loan will enable him to have a new motorbike and he also hopes to make more income so as to make a better living and keep his children in school.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike for his business.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Kang Meas district

loans.name: Anatoli

texts.en:
Anatoli is a hardworking farmer from Crimea. Farming is his full-time job and the only source of income for his family. Anatoli owns 12 hectares of land and rents another 12. The crops that Anatoli grows are very diverse and include cantaloupes, onions, beans and grapes. Recently Anatoli has planted more grapes and, in order to take proper care of his crop and reduce manual labour, he has decided to invest in an irrigation system. 

Please help Anatoli to develop his farm by helping him to buy an irrigation system.

loans.use: to purchase irrigation equipment

loans.name: Gloria Maritza

texts.es: La señora  Gloria Maritza  vive en la  ciudad de Managua se caracteriza por ser una persona Responsable. sus labores cotidianos consisten en  el  cual  llega a su negocio a las 5 am de la mañana y se retira a las 6pm, su  negocio es muy frecuentado ya que brinda una excelente servicio, sus clientes son personas que  viajan al occidente del país,    visito nuestra oficina en Managua   para solicitar Un préstamo  para la compra de paca de ropa americana, doña Maritza tiene 7 años de trabajar con  préstamos de ceprodel,  con  este   va  a comprar pacas  de ropa para  ofrecer a sus clientes variedad de su producto. Gracias a este financiamiento podrá obtener mejores ingresos para el desarrollo de su familia y el crecimiento económico de su negocio.
texts.en: Señora Gloria Maritza lives in the city of Managua. She is characterized as being a responsible person. Her daily work consists of arriving at her business at 5 am in the morning and working until 6 pm. Her business is very popular, since she offers excellent service. Her customers are people who travel to the western part of the country. She visited our office in Managua to apply for a loan to purchase a bale of American clothing. Doña Maritza has worked with loans from CEPRODELl for 7 years. With this one she is going to buy bales of clothing so that she can offer her customers a variety of her products. Thanks to this financing, she will be able to obtain better income for the advancement of her family and the economic growth of her business.

loans.use: to buy a bale of American clothing.

loans.name: Hector Luis

texts.es:
Héctor es un hombre de 24 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica con su pareja y su pequeño hijo de un año, quienes son su razón y principal motivo para seguir esforzándose y salir adelante en la vida; en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol con sus vecinos y amigos, y en algunas ocasiones prepara unos riquísimos “Tallarines Rojos” para compartir con su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos no pudo estudiar una carrera universitaria, pero sueña con poder hacerlo algún día. 
Desde muy joven Héctor ha realizado diversos trabajos, él siempre ha sido muy trabajador, entusiasta y tiene un gran deseo de superación; actualmente trabaja como chofer de su mototaxi propia, él labora un aproximado de 12 horas diarias, en las cuales puede atender hasta 50 clientes, él cree que su negocio marcha bien debido a su trato respetuoso y amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Héctor se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de un juego de llantas, puertas delanteras y un toldo para su mototaxi; de esta manera Héctor podrá contar con un vehículo acondicionado y en buenas condiciones, con ello espera poder aumentar su clientela e incrementar sus ingresos y así poco a poco en un futuro no muy lejano desea poder adquirir otra mototaxi para expandir su negocio.
texts.en:
Héctor, 24, lives in the city of Ica with his partner and young one-year-old child, who are his reason and primary motive for continuing to work and get ahead in life. In his free time he likes to play soccer with his neighbors and friends and on occasion he prepares scrumptious tallarines rojos (spaghetti with tomato sauce) to share with his family. Unfortunately due to lack of resources he was not able to go to university, but he dreams of doing it some day. 

From a very early age Héctor has done a variety of work. He has always been very hardworking, enthusiastic and with great desire to overcome. Currently he works as a driver with his own motorcycle-taxi. He works approximately 12 hours a day during which time he can serve up to 50 customers. He believes that his business is going well owing to the respectful, friendly treatment he offers to his customers. 

Héctor is very grateful to the Kiva lenders since, thanks to their help, he will be able to purchase a set of tires, front doors and an awning for his motorcycle-taxi. In this way Héctor will be able to have an vehicle which is outfitted and in good shape with which he hopes to be able to increase his customer base and grow his earnings. Gradually, in the not too distant future, he hopes to be able to acquire another motorcycle-taxi in order to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase of a set of tires, front doors and an awning for his motorcycle-taxi.

loans.name: Horn

texts.en:
Horn is forty-two years old and a married mother of three, two of whom work at the factory and one who is still in school. She and her family live in Prey Chhor district. Horn and her husband have been farming rice for almost twenty years. They also raise pigs and cows to earn additional income to support the family. The business earns them around six U.S. dollars per day. 

This is Horn's first time with VisionFund. She applied for the loan to buy more farmland and really hopes that this loan will enable her to grow more rice so that she can make more money to support her child's school fees and so that her family can live in better conditions.

loans.use: to buy more farmland.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Matilde Idalia

texts.es:
La señora Matilde tiene 36 años de edad, es casada y tiene tres hijos.  Ella aprendió el oficio de elaboración de pan por iniciativa propia, debido a que siempre le ha gustado la cocina. Por ese motivo se dedica a la elaboración y venta de pan todos los días, en su comunidad y en lugares cercanos. Todo lo que necesita para elaborar el pan, lo compra en una ciudad del oriente del país. Ella aprovecha cada viaje que realiza para comprar harina, manteca, levadura, moldes, etc.

El préstamo que esta solicitando Matilde es para terminar de construir una habitación a su casa y la otra parte será para comprar insumos para la elaboración de pan. Con la inversión ella podrá terminar la habitación para que sus hijos se queden allí, la parte que falta construir es la que se moja cuando llueve. También su familia estará más cómoda y podrá comprar moldes para elaborar pan que tanto necesita. En un futuro Matilde piensa ponerle ladrillo al piso para mayor comodidad de su familia y adquirir un horno más grande.
texts.en:
Señora Matilde is 36 years old. She is married and has three children. She learned the trade of bread-making on her own initiative, inasmuch as she has always liked cooking. For this reason, she makes and sells bread every day, in her community and in nearby locations. She buys everything she needs to make bread in a city in the eastern part of the country. She takes advantage of every trip that she makes to buy flour, lard, leavening, baking tins, etc.

The loan that Matilde is applying for is to finish building a room at her house, and the other part will be used to buy supplies to make bread. With the investment she will be able to finish the room so that her children can stay there. The part that is not finished is the part that gets wet when it rains. Her family will also be more comfortable, and she will be able to buy baking tins that she so much needs for making bread. In the future, Matilde is thinking of putting tile on the floor for the better comfort of her family and acquiring a bigger oven.

loans.use: to finish constructing a room in her house, and the other part will be to purchase supplies to make bread

loans.name: Josefa Dolores

texts.es: La señora Josefa dolores vive en la ciudad de Managua madre de familia. el negocio de la señora Josefa es la venta de productos de belleza para damas y caballeros en las empresas su  día de trabajo empieza a las 9 am  y regresa a su casa de habitación a las 4pm , con el préstamo obtenido va poder incrementar su inventario y ofertarle a su clientela variedad   en línea de cosmético y perfume.
texts.en: Josefa Dolores lives in the city of Managua and is a mother.  Her business is selling beauty products for women and men in companies.  Her work day starts at 9 am and she returns to her home at 4 pm.  With the loan obtained she will be able to increase her inventory and offer her customers a variety of cosmetic and perfume lines.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and perfume.

loans.name: Songorn's Group

texts.en:
Songon, 33, is married with four children, three of whom are still in school. She and her husband earn a living in a rural area of the Kang Meas district by farming rice, making palm sugar and selling grocery items. She has been in this business for nine years. The main challenge for her family’s business is the unhealthy rice crop and insects.

This is the second loan for Songon’s group with VisionFund and they completely paid back the loans, which have enabled her to afford her children’s education and to set aside some savings. With her current business, she can earn around 23,000KHR per day. She is now leading her group to apply for a loan with VisionFund of 1,200,000KHR. Songon, who is the leader, is going to use her portion to buy fertilizer and seed for her farmland and also buy gasoline for a water pump. She hopes to make more productive rice crops so as to make more income to improve her lifestyle and keep her children in school. 

.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seed for her farmland.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Kang Meas district

loans.name: Chroeb's Group

texts.en:
Chroeb, 47, is a married mother of two children, one daughter and one son. She earns a living in a rural village of the Kang Meas district through farming and selling rice. The main challenge for her family’s business is the unhealthy rice crop and insects. 

This is the second loan for Chroeb’s group with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund and they successfully paid back the loans which have enabled her to set aside some savings for future needs. With her current business, she earns around 21,000 KHR per day to spend for daily expenses. She is leading her group to apply for a loan of 1,000,000 KHR each. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to fertilizer for her farmland and to buy gasoline for a water pump to bring water to her rice farm. She hopes to make more productive rice crops and increase her lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland and gasoline for a water pump.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Kang Meas district

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a greenhouse

loans.name: Héctor

texts.es:
El señor Héctor tiene 51 años de edad. Él proviene de una familia de escasos recursos económicos, debido a eso desde los 12 años de edad trabaja en la agricultura. Por esa razón no pudo estudiar en la escuela, porque como hermano mayor tenia que trabajar para ayudar a los gastos de la casa, pues eran 8 hijos en el hogar y él se preocupaba por sus hermanos y trabajaba muy fuerte para que no les faltara nada. Ayudo a todos sus hermanos para que estudiaran hasta el sexto grado y es así como don Héctor ha adquirido una gran experiencia en su trabajo. 

Para comprar todos sus insumos agrícolas, el señor Héctor recorre media hora de camino a pie hasta el desvió principal, para esperar el autobús que lo conducirá hasta la ciudad que esta a unos cuarenta y cinco minutos. Luego se regresa en el mismo autobús con los materiales hasta el desvió donde abordo el autobús, después él paga un vehiculo para que se los lleven hasta su casa, ya que el autobús no llega hasta su casa. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundacion Campo, es para comprar semilla mejorada, abono, fertilizantes y para pago del alquiler del terreno donde cultivara. Con la inversión podrá producir maíz, el cual es indispensable para sobrevivir él y su familia y lo venderá cuando el precio este bueno y le permita obtener ganancias de su producción. 

Él desea ahorrar para realizarle unos arreglos a su casa donde vive, debido a que tiene cuartones de madera deteriorados, tejas quebradas, etc.
texts.en: Mr. Hector is 51 years old.  He comes from a family of limited financial resources, and because of that has worked in agriculture from the age of 12. As a result, he could not study in school, because as the older brother, had to work to help with the household expenses.  There were 8 children at home and he cared for his siblings and worked very hard to not missing anything. He helped all his siblings to study through sixth grade and this is how Don Hector has acquired extensive experience in his work. To buy all agricultural materials, Hector runs half an hour's walk to the main diversion to await the bus that takes him to the city, about forty-five minutes away. Then he is back on the bus with the materials and then he pays a vehicle to take him home because the bus does not come to his house. The loan his is requesting to the Fundación Campo, is to buy improved seed, fertilizer, and to rent the land where he will cultivate. With the investment will produce corn, which is essential for him and his family’s survival, and will sell when the price is good.  This will enable him to profit from his production. He wants to save for some repairs to his house, because it has deteriorated wooden scantlings, broken tiles, etc..

loans.use: to buy improved seed, fertilizer, and to rent the land where he cultivates.

loans.name: Inez Veronica

texts.es: La señora Inés verónica vive en la ciudad de Managua es una persona responsable trabajadora  el negocio de doña Inés es un comedor donde elabora desayuno, y almuerzo, atiende clientes que trabaja en  las empresas ubicadas cerca de su negocio, este crédito lo solicita para la compra de  granos básicos, perecederos, carnes, jugos, aguas. Con el apoyo de  ceprodel   va a obtener  los productos  para la elaboración de sus deliciosas variedad de comida,   doña Inés tiene 5 años de trabajar  con ceprodel y nos habla de como le han beneficiado,  a través de los créditos le ha permitido incrementar su negocio  con las compra de activos fijos como sillas, mesas, y equipo de  cocina.
texts.en:
Sra. Inés Verónica lives in the city of Managua.  She is a responsible hard worker. Her business is a restaurant where she prepares breakfast and lunch. She serves customers who work for the companies located near her business. She is requesting this loan to buy basic grains, perishables, meat, juice and water. 

With the support of Ceprodel she is going to buy the products she needs to make her delicious varieties of food.  Doña Inés has been working with Ceprodel for five years and tells us how good they have been to her. The loans have enabled her to improve her business through the purchase of fixed assets, such as chairs, tables and kitchen equipment.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, perishables, meat, juice and water.

loans.name: Lesbia Concepcion

texts.es:
La joven Lesbia es soltera,  labora como promotora de turismo ecologico, siendo el objetivo en la mejora de su casa, ya que el techo esta en malas condiciones y esta el invierno, asi como parte de la infraestructura tiene que hacer reparaciones de paredes, vive junto a sus padres, siento el apoyo moral y economico en tiempo de estudios.
Con este financiamiento es para la compra de materiales de zinc, perlines, golosos,hierro bloques, cemento, pintura anticorresiva, clavos, madera para remodelacion de paredes. Y estar en mejores condiciones de vivienda.
texts.en:
The young woman Lesbia is single and works as a tour agent for ecological tourism. Her objective is to improve her house since the roof is in bad shape and it is winter, along with part of the infrastructure as she needs to make repairs to walls. She lives with her parents, being moral and financial support during school season. 

With this loan she will purchase corrugated metal roofing material, beams, screws, iron, cement, cinder block, corrosion-resistant paint, nails and wood for remodelling walls, so she may have better living quarters.

loans.use: to purchase corrugated metal roofing material, beams, screws, cement, cinder block and other items for beginning construction.

loans.name: Yan

texts.en:
Yan, 61, lives in a rural village of the Dambae district and she is a married mother of six children, four of whom are her responsibility working at the family’s business. She is a farmer who has been planting cassava on five-hectare farmland for 20 years and farming rice on 0.5 hectare of farmland for eight years to support the family. Flooding and the cheap price of cassava crops are the main challenge for her in making a living. The average daily income she earns from the current business is around 37,000 KHR.

Yan received a first loan with VisionFund one year ago and the loan has enabled her to better support her big family and lease a plot of plantation. With a good business, she is applying for another loan with VisionFund to buy fertilizer and use a portion of it to spend for land preparation. She hopes to increase her family’s income to make their lives better.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for farmland.

loans.name: Samoeun's Group

texts.en:
A villager from the Dambae district, Samoeun is a 32-year-old mother of two dependent sons and one of them is still in primary school. She has been farming rice and planting cassava as the family’s main source of income for several years. This business earns her around 130,000KHR per day. With her current business, she has been challenged with the decrease of cassava’s price.

This is the third loan for Samoeun and the first loan for her group, Oun with VisionFund.
