loans.name: Leanghuoy's Group

texts.en:
Leanghuoy, 48, is a married mother of six children. She lives in a rural area of the Sangke district. Two of her children are dependent and still in school. She has been raising pigs for ten years, and now she is raising eight pigs on the site. She earns extra income by selling cakes at school. The main challenges for her family’s business are the increasing price of feed and decrease of the pig’s price. Currently, she can earn around 31,000 KHR per day.

This is the first loan for Leanghuoy’s group with Kiva’s field partner, VisionFund. They are requesting a loan of 1,000,000 KHR each. Leanghuoy, who is the leader, wants to use her portion to buy feed for her pigs and use a portion of it to buy flour for her cake business. With this loan, she hopes to make more income so as to make a better living.

loans.use: To buy feed for her pigs and flour for her cake business

loans.name: Nim

texts.en: Nim is 31 years old and a married mother of three. She has one girl and two boys. Her family lives in a wooden house located in a rural area of Battambang province. She has been farming for ten years. As an additional source of income for the family, Nim also sells grocery products. Nim obtained her first loan from VisionFund in 2011, and this loan has helped to improve the living condition of her family and has helped her business. After she successfully repaid the first loan, Nim decided to request another loan. She got this money to buy fertilizers for her crops and gasoline for a water pump. With this loan, Nim hopes to grow high-quality crops and then sell the products for a higher price so that she can get some money to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and gasoline for her water pump

loans.name: Judith

texts.es: Judith de 62 años de edad, en condición de mujer separada y madre de 4 hijos adultos,  es la propietaria de una heladería ubicada en un municipio muy cercano a la ciudad de Barranquilla. Ella está vinculada a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo desde hace 19 años, durante los cuales ha recibido 27 financiamientos; inició con esta organización, trabajando en un grupo solidario  y posteriormente como creció, empezó a recibir créditos individuales durante más de 10 años. Ella inició con una tienda que se volvió muy productiva, pero hubo grandes desafíos como el de su salud y muchos créditos otorgados sin experiencia, situación que debió sortear muy bien, cambiando de actividad como es la que hoy, vendiendo en un punto estratégico productos alimenticios y refrescos, además de estar afiliada a empresas multinacionales que comercializan  artículos mediante guías especializadas, con las que Judith promociona y vende. Ella está muy agradecida, porque en todas las épocas, buenas, regulares y malas ha estado la Fundación apoyándola y ha logrado salir adelante, eso si con disciplina y mucha honestidad en el cumplimiento de sus obligaciones financieras y personales. Hoy está aplicando a su primer credikiva, porque quiere mejorar su infraestructura de negocios y adicionar vitrinas calentadoras, hornos microondas, comprar helados, refrescos y dulcería en general, para que sus clientes noten un ambiente cada vez mas confortable, bien dotado y se sientan a gusto, ingresando a su establecimiento y comprando todo lo que su paladar desee, porque Judith vende delicias alimenticias, que impactan el gusto de su clientela  y esto es justamente lo que genera el éxito de su credikiva.
texts.en: Judith is 62 years old. She is separated and mother to four adult children. She is the owner of an ice cream shop located in a town very near to the city of Barranquilla. She has been linked to Fundacion Mario Santo Domingo for 19 years, during which she has received 27 loans. She began with this organization working with a group and later, as it grew, she began to receive individual loans over more than 10 years. She started with a shop that became very productive but she had big challenges like her health and many loans granted without experience, a situation that she had to overcome very well, changing her work to what it is today, selling food products and refreshments at a strategic point, in addition to be affiliated with multinational companies that sell items through specialized guides, with whom Judith promotes and sells. She is very thankful because in all the years -- good, regular and bad -- Fundacion has been supporting her and she has successfully got ahead with discipline and a lot of honesty in achieving her financial and personal obligations. Today she is applying for her first crediKiva because she wants to improve the infrastructure of her businesses and add heating cabinets, microwaves, buy ice cream, refreshments and sweets in general so that her customers find an atmosphere that is more comfortable, well-equipped and they feel at ease, entering her establishment and buying everything their taste desires because Judith sells delicious food that impacts her customers' liking and this is exactly what creates the success of crediKiva.

loans.use: to buy heating cabinets, microwaves, ice cream, refreshments, and sweets, in general.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Sam Ath

texts.en:
Sam Ath (in the photo) has full-time employment in a hotel. Her husband is a driver, and he drives for the ministry of information. They have been married since 1999 and have one son. Previously, Sam Ath’s son attended school, but he stopped studying and has been a garment worker for two months. The family lives in a village about 15 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. 

Sam Ath is requesting another loan in the amount of $1,000 in order to buy a motorbike for her son to get to work.

loans.use: To purchase a motorbike for her son to drive to work

loans.name: Salat's Group

texts.en:
Aged 32, Salat is a married mother of four children. Two of them are dependent and still in school. Her family’s source of income is from rice farming and fish trading, which she has been in for almost ten years. The main challenge for her family’s business is flooding. Currently, she earns around 21,000 KHR per day. 

This is the first loan for Salat’s group with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now applying for a loan of 1,000,000 KHR each, Salat, who is the leader, will use her portion to buy seeds for her farmland, buy more fish, and spend money for land preparation. She hopes to earn more income so as to keep her children in school and make a better living.

loans.use: To buy more fish and spend money for land preparation

loans.name: Angelica

texts.es: Angélica de 41 años de edad vive a orillas del mar caribe en el municipio de Puerto Colombia, donde la playa, la brisa y el mar, son condicionantes del turismo de las ciudades y municipios cercanos, cuyas familias se trasladan especialmente los fines de semanas, festivos y en sus vacaciones, a deleitarse con este ambiente de gran descanso físico y espiritual.  Angélica tiene un restaurante en un sector bien ubicado y de potencial crecimiento, pues a su alrededor hay escenarios deportivos y educativos, en un lugar muy alto donde se divisa el viejo muelle marítimo del municipio, lo que potencializa  el éxito de sus inversiones. En su negocio,  Angélica tiene como sus principales clientes, a conductores de buses intermunicipales, los cuales promueven las delicias de la deliciosa comida que ella prepara en su restaurante y que combina con refrescos y helados, pues desde muy niña aprendió este oficio, debido a que su madre tenia una caseta turística en el balneario de Prado Mar, ubicado a 5 minutos de Puerto Colombia, donde preparaban toda clase de platos marinos. El restaurante  de Angélica, toda su familia lo apoya, alternándose continuamente entre las labores domésticas y productivas, como la atención de clientes y en el caso de sus dos hijos en las edades de 13 y 15 años, lo realizan priorizando sus estudios y con ello el rendimiento académico. Angélica y su cónyuge se sienten muy felices con su restaurante, pues con el fruto de su trabajo en unidad familiar han logrado la construcción de su propia casa y esto da sentido a sus vidas, para continuar albergando en sus mentes, el sueño de apoyar a sus hijos y que estos en el futuro se conviertan en profesionales exitosos.   En la actualidad Angélica está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará en mayor volumen, víveres que son su materia prima para preparar los alimentos; con ello planea obtener descuentos, por su estilo de compra en mas cantidad que la acostumbrada y así logrará apuntarle al mejoramiento de su competitividad, ofreciendo precios atractivos para sus clientes,   potencializando el incremento de sus ventas y con ello el de sus ingresos,  con los que cuenta para alcanzar sus sueños familiares.
texts.en: Angélica who is 41 years old lives on the Caribbean sea shore in the town of Puerto Colombia where the beach, breeze and sea are conditions for tourism in the cities and towns close by, whose families visit especially on weekends, holidays and their vacations to delight in this atmosphere of great physical and spiritual rest. Angelica has a restaurant in a well located and potentially growing area where there are sporting and educational settings nearby, in a very high place where you can see the old town maritime dock, which hints at the success of her investments. In her business, Angelica's main customers are intermunicipal bus drivers who promote the delicious food that she prepares in her restaurant and that she combines with refreshments and ice cream. Since she was a little girl, she learned this job since her mother had a little tourist house in the health resort of Prado Mar, located 5 minutes from Puerto Colombia where they prepared all types of seafood dishes. All of her family supports Angelica's restaurant, alternating continuously among household and productive chores, such as attending to customers, and in the case of her two children who are 13 and 15, they prioritize their studies and thus their academic performance. Angelica and her partner feel very happy with their restaurant since, with the fruit of their work in family unity, they have managed to build their own house and this gives meaning to their lives to continue harboring in their minds the dream to support their children and see them in the future become successful professionals. Currently, Angelica is applying for a crediKiva, the first loan she is making with Fundacion Mario Santo Domingo, through which she will buy, in greater volume, food that is the basic ingredients to prepare food. With this, she plans to obtain discounts, in thereby buy in greater quanitity than she is accustomed and this way she will improve upon the competition, offering attractive prices to her customers, potentially increasing her sales and, with this, her income, which she needs to achieve her family dreams.

loans.use: to buy a greater volume of food.

loans.name: Salvador

texts.es:
El   Sr. Salvador es vigilante de una escuela en la cual su esposa la Sra. María es intendente, ellos cuentan con dos hijos los cuales cursan la educación secundaria y son los que los apoyan en las tareas domesticas ya que la Sra. María labora durante el día y el Sr. Salvador durante  la noche. Son una familia muy unida y se apoyan entre ellos.
Con la ayuda que nos pide construirá la barda trasera que colinda con casa hacia tras, con ello tendrá más seguridad en su hogar ya que debido a la delincuencia tendrá más protegida su vivienda y ya que vive en casas de interés social, son muy pequeñas y con la construcción de esta barda se evitara conflictos con sus vecinos.
texts.en: Salvador is a caretaker for a school where his wife Maria is a custodian. They have two children who are in high school and are who they support with their domestic work since Maria works during the day and Salvador during the night. They are a very united family who support each other. With the help they've asked from us, they will build a fence that borders their backyard with which they will have greater security in their home since, due to crime, they will have more home protection and since they live in social housing, the houses are small and with building the fence they will avoid conflicts with their neighbors.

loans.use: to buy materials to build a backyard fence.

loans.name: Renee

texts.es: Renee es socia del  Bancomunal Alegría Huamanga, tiene 32 años de edad y es madre de 3 hijos, es socia de FINCA Perú hace 2 años. Se dedica a la venta de comidas en el mercado. Está agradecida con la institución por las facilidades de préstamo que le ofrece. Ella dice que las capacitaciones que recibe en su Bancomunal son muy interesantes ya que le enseñaron como invertir el dinero en su negocio y también cómo educar a sus hijos, lo que mas le gusto aprender es a ahorrar. Su meta es tener su casa propia. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de leña, verduras y abarrotes que son utilizados en la preparación de los alimentos.
texts.en: Renee is a member of Bancomunal Alegria Huamanga. She is 32 years old and mother to three children. She has been a member of FINCA Peru for two years. She is dedicated to selling food in the market. She is thankful to the institution for facilitating the loan offered. She says that the training that she receives in her community bank are very interesting since they taught her how to invest the money in her business and also how to educate her children. What she likes most is to learn how to save. Her goal is to have her own house. The loan she is requesting will be invested in the purchase of wood, vegetables, and groceries that are used in the preparation of food.

loans.use: to buy wood, vegetables and groceries that are used in the preparation of food.

loans.name: Gbedokpo Group

texts.fr: GBEDOKPO est un groupe de trois personnes, dont les membres sont des sœurs. La représentante du groupe, Emilienne Andéa (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 44 ans et est mariée à un soudeur du nom de Moïse. Le couple a deux enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Emilienne Andéa a très peu fréquenté l’école. Emilienne Andéa vit ensemble avec ses enfants et son mari. Le couple assure ensemble les différentes charges de la maison. Depuis près de deux ans, Emilienne Andéa vend de la nourriture et du pain à son domicile. Emilienne Andéa s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. C’est la deuxième fois que Emilienne Andéa et les autres membres du groupe GBEDOKPO sollicitent l’appui financier de ALIDé en vue de renforcer leur fonds de roulement et leur activité et de mieux répondre aux exigences de leur clientèle. Le premier crédit reçu a été bien remboursé.
texts.en:
GBEDOKPO is a group of three people who are all sisters. The representative of the group is called Emilienne Andéa (pictured with her hand raised in the photo), and she is 44 years of age and married to a welder called Moïse. The couple has two children at school, who are under their care. 

Emilienne Andéa did not spend much time at school. She lives with her children and her husband, and together the couple covers the various household needs. For almost two years Emilienne Andéa has sold food and bread from her home. She gets her supplies from a market in Benin. 

This is the second time that Emilienne Andéa and the other members of the GBEDOKPO group have asked for the financial support of ALIDé. They have done so to increase their working capital and strengthen their business, and also to meet the demands of their customers. Their first loan was successfully repaid.

loans.use: To buy bread and sauce seasonings.
